section.p:
The shrine is lit by hundreds of candles, each illuminating a tiny niche in which there is a statue of a different god. You can make an offering of
if you wish, in which case
to see what response you get. If you roll a blessing that you already have then the offering is wasted, because you can only have one blessing at a time of each type.

outcomes.outcome: The gods ignore you; no blessing

section.p: Ability blessings can be used once to reroll the dice when using that ability.
You can also buy wands from the sorcerer’s booth at the side of the shrine. His stock is small but inexpensive.
